statements: DELETE FROM TreatmentPlan WHERE health_history LIKE 'Diabetes%' AND patient_id = 123;
DELETE FROM TreatmentPlan WHERE preferences LIKE '%exercise%' AND patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Patients WHERE age > 60);
DELETE FROM TreatmentPlan WHERE health_history = 'Heart Disease' OR preferences IS NULL;
DELETE FROM PatientPreferences WHERE patient_id = 456 AND preferred_treatment = 'Surgery';
DELETE FROM PatientHealthHistory WHERE health_condition = 'Diabetes' AND treatment_plan = 'Medication';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age < 30 AND health_history LIKE '%asthma%';
DELETE FROM treatment_plans WHERE plan_id IN (SELECT plan_id FROM treatment_plans WHERE recommendations LIKE '%follow-up%');
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE preference_category = 'diet' AND patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patients WHERE age >= 50);
DELETE FROM Preferences WHERE preference_type = 'diet' AND preference_value = 'vegetarian';
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patients WHERE age > 60);
DELETE FROM medication WHERE patient_id = (SELECT patient_id FROM patients WHERE name = 'John Doe');
